meanings.definition: Exodontists: specialists in the extraction of teeth.
meanings.sent1: The exodontists carefully removed the decayed tooth.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the exodontists tomorrow to get my wisdom teeth removed.
meanings.sent3: The exodontists joked that they were in the business of 'pulling teeth' all day.
meanings.sent4: Watching the exodontists work felt like witnessing a tooth extraction ballet.
meanings.sent5: The exodontists' precision in extracting teeth was as sharp as their tools.

meanings.definition: Exodontists: those who perform dental extractions.
meanings.sent1: My friend is training to become one of the exodontists at the dental clinic.
meanings.sent2: The exodontists in the hospital were busy attending to patients with toothaches.
meanings.sent3: The exodontists shared stories of their most challenging tooth extractions during lunch.
meanings.sent4: The exodontists' hands moved swiftly and skillfully during the extraction procedure.
meanings.sent5: Patients trust the exodontists to perform painless dental extractions.
